channel.title: [WIN] Enter to win ~~> 1.5M Rs2007 <~~ Gold [WIN]
channel.description:
[CENTER] Are you struggling to build enough money to start a full experience of the game so many crave!
Well we are giving away [COLOR=#ffd700][B]500k Rs2007 Gold[/B][/COLOR] to [COLOR=#00ff00][B]3[/B] [/COLOR]lucky entrants!
How to enter:
[URL=http://www.facebook.com/pages/virus/314916138611936][IMG]http://www.devonandsomersetballoons.co.uk/Sites/Go%20Ballooning/library/images/Small%20images-Facebook%20logo.png[/img][/URL]
Click the Facebook image above, Once you're there [B]simply like our page.[/B]
Don't have Facebook?
[URL=https://twitter.com/RuneTut][IMG]http://www.alteracvolley.com/wp-content/themes/typebased/images/twitter.png[/img][/URL]
How about Twitter?
[B]Once you have entered please --> PM ME <-- [/B] your Facebook or twitter name so we can validate your entrant!
[COLOR=#ff0000]Removing your follow / like with result in your name being removed from the draw. [/COLOR] [B]Draw will end Sunday 10th March 2013[/B]
(y) Good luck (y)
==== Entrants ====
[/CENTER]

item.title: [WIN] Enter to win ~~> 1.5M Rs2007 <~~ Gold [WIN]
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I assume the RuneScape Discussion board rules apply over this board as well so you should have run this giveaway by a moderator or other staff member first. In accordance with these rules anyway.

I highly doubt this is allowed because it isn’t actually a free giveaway, you’re wanting something in return.

Read full topic
